glsa.title: arpwatch: Privilege escalation
glsa.synopsis: arpwatch is vulnerable to the escalation of privileges.

background.p: The ethernet monitor program; for keeping track of ethernet/ip address pairings.

description.p: Arpwatch does not properly drop supplementary groups.

impact.p: Attackers, if able to exploit arpwatch, could escalate privileges outside of the running process.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All arpwatch users should upgrade to the latest version:
